Plot: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Flight school to become an aviator, with the help of a tough gunnery sergeant and his new girlfriend.
Title: An Officer and a Gentleman
Actors: Richard Gere, Debra Winger, David Keith, Robert Loggia
tomatoConsensus: Old-fashioned without sacrificing its characters to simplicity, An Officer and a Gentleman successfully walks the fine line between sweeping romance and melodrama.
